subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
Franchises
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ top executive, Donnie Walsh, believes he made all the right moves last season, but his team is 1-8 and barely treading water.
snippet: The Knicks’ top executive, Donnie Walsh, believes he made all the right moves last season, but his team is 1-8 and barely treading water.
